title: Successful login with valid email and password
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a valid registered email address.
Input the correct password for the email.
Click on the login button.
Verify that the user is redirected to the dashboard page.
Verify that user-specific metrics are displayed on the dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when the user provides invalid email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input an invalid or unregistered email address.
Input an incorrect password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating invalid login credentials.
Verify that the user remains on the login page.

title: Access blocked when subscription is expired
description: Verify that users with expired subscriptions cannot access the system and are redirected accordingly.

steps.description: Attempt to log in with a user whose subscription has expired.
Verify that the system blocks access and redirects to the subscription expiration notification screen.
Verify that navigation to other parts of the system is disabled for this user.

title: Display free and occupied time slots correctly on calendar
description: Ensure the calendar interface marks free and occupied time slots accurately based on existing appointments.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the agenda management page.
View the calendar for a selected day with multiple pre-existing appointments.
Verify that reserved time slots are clearly marked as occupied.
Verify that unreserved time slots are indicated as free and available for scheduling.

title: Create new appointment on the calendar
description: Verify that a user can create a new appointment in an available time slot within the calendar interface.

steps.description: Navigate to the agenda page.
Select a free time slot on the calendar to create a new appointment.
Fill in required appointment details such as patient, date, time, and reason.
Save the appointment.
Verify that the appointment appears on the calendar in the selected time slot.

title: Edit existing appointment details
description: Verify that an existing appointment can be edited and updated correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the agenda page.
Select an existing appointment from the calendar.
Modify details such as time, patient, or appointment reason.
Save the changes.
Verify that the appointment updates are reflected on the calendar.

title: Create new patient record with mandatory information
description: Verify that a new patient can be added successfully when all mandatory patient information fields are correctly filled.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient management page.
Select the option to add a new patient.
Fill in mandatory fields such as name, contact information, date of birth.
Save the new patient record.
Verify that the new patient appears in the patients list.

title: View detailed patient information including history
description: Verify that selecting a patient from the list displays detailed information including medical and appointment history.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient management page.
Select an existing patient from the list.
Verify that detailed patient data and historical appointments or treatments are displayed.

title: Attempt to add patient with missing mandatory fields
description: Verify the system prevents adding a patient when mandatory fields are not filled and shows appropriate validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the patient addition form.
Leave mandatory fields empty or with invalid data.
Attempt to save the patient record.
Verify error messages are displayed indicating which mandatory fields need to be completed.
Verify that the patient is not added to the list.

title: Record a new financial expense with category
description: Verify that users can record a new financial expense and assign it to the correct category.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial management page.
Select the option to add a new expense.
Fill in expense details including amount, description, date, and category.
Save the expense record.
Verify that the new expense appears in the list with correct details.

title: View financial reports and categorized expense summaries
description: Verify that the financial dashboard displays accurate expense reports with correct categorization and summaries.

steps.description: Navigate to the financial reports section.
Verify that expenses are grouped correctly by category.
Verify that expense totals and charts reflect accurate data.

title: Update user personal settings successfully
description: Verify that users can update their personal profile information in settings and changes persist after saving.

steps.description: Navigate to the user settings page.
Modify personal profile fields such as name, contact info, or password.
Save the changes.
Verify that the changes are saved and reflected in the user profile.

title: Update clinic profile settings with validation
description: Verify that clinic profile settings can be updated with correct validation and persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to clinic settings page.
Modify clinic details such as name, address, contact, and custom configurations.
Save updates.
Verify that the clinic profile updates are saved and correctly displayed.

title: Prevent saving clinic settings with invalid data
description: Verify that attempting to save invalid clinic profile data (e.g. empty required fields) results in validation errors and no data persistence.

steps.description: Access clinic profile settings.
Clear or input invalid values in mandatory fields.
Attempt to save the profile.
Verify validation error messages indicating missing or invalid fields.
Verify that no changes are saved.

title: Administrator manages user accounts
description: Verify that an administrator can access the admin panel and perform user management actions such as viewing user list and disabling users.

steps.description: Login as administrator.
Navigate to the admin dashboard.
Access the user management section.
Verify that a list of users is displayed.
Select a user and disable the user account.
Verify that the user's account status changes to disabled.
